trans-unit.source: Delete a pool from an account
trans-unit.target: Delete a pool from an account

trans-unit.source: Deletes a pool from the specified account.
trans-unit.target: Deletes a pool from the specified account.

trans-unit.source: Request
trans-unit.target: Request

trans-unit.source: See <link xlink:href="0e07b9cb-8fdf-4ff7-b707-e964200df0f8" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Common parameters and headers</link> for headers and parameters that are used by all requests related to pools.
trans-unit.target: See <link xlink:href="0e07b9cb-8fdf-4ff7-b707-e964200df0f8" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Common parameters and headers</link> for headers and parameters that are used by all requests related to pools.

trans-unit.source: Method
trans-unit.target: Method

trans-unit.source: Request URI
trans-unit.target: Request URI

trans-unit.source: DELETE
trans-unit.target: DELETE

trans-unit.source: Replace {pool-id} with the id of the pool that you want to delete.
trans-unit.target: Replace {pool-id} with the id of the pool that you want to delete.

trans-unit.source: Response
trans-unit.target: Response

trans-unit.source: Status code: 202.
trans-unit.target: Status code: 202.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <link xlink:href="e9da2d54-053a-4392-a5ba-26229c7cc9a5" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Status and Error Codes</link>.
trans-unit.target: For more information, see <link xlink:href="e9da2d54-053a-4392-a5ba-26229c7cc9a5" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Status and Error Codes</link>.

trans-unit.source: Remarks
trans-unit.target: Remarks

trans-unit.source: When you request that a pool be deleted, the following actions occur:
trans-unit.target: When you request that a pool be deleted, the following actions occur:

trans-unit.source: The pool state is set to deleting.
trans-unit.target: The pool state is set to deleting.

trans-unit.source: Any ongoing resize operation on the pool is stopped
trans-unit.target: Any ongoing resize operation on the pool is stopped

trans-unit.source: The Batch service starts resizing the pool to zero nodes.
trans-unit.target: The Batch service starts resizing the pool to zero nodes.

trans-unit.source: Any tasks running on existing nodes are terminated and requeued (as if a Resize Pool operation had been requested with the default requeue option).
trans-unit.target: Any tasks running on existing nodes are terminated and requeued (as if a Resize Pool operation had been requested with the default requeue option).

trans-unit.source: The pool is removed from the system.
trans-unit.target: The pool is removed from the system.

trans-unit.source: Because running tasks are requeued, the user can rerun these tasks by updating their job with a different pool (see the Update Job API).
trans-unit.target: Because running tasks are requeued, the user can rerun these tasks by updating their job with a different pool (see the Update Job API).

trans-unit.source: The tasks can then run on the new pool.
trans-unit.target: The tasks can then run on the new pool.

trans-unit.source: If you want to override the requeue behavior, then you should call Resize Pool explicitly to shrink the pool to zero size before calling DeletePool.
trans-unit.target: If you want to override the requeue behavior, then you should call Resize Pool explicitly to shrink the pool to zero size before calling DeletePool.

trans-unit.source: If you call an Update, Patch or Delete API on a pool in the deleting state, it will fail with HTTP status code 409 (Conflict), with error code PoolBeingDeleted.
trans-unit.target: If you call an Update, Patch or Delete API on a pool in the deleting state, it will fail with HTTP status code 409 (Conflict), with error code PoolBeingDeleted.
